nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects

Class TextObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects.GameObject
      • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects.TextObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants

    public class TextObject
extends GameObject
    Use this class to draw text. You could also implement it by your own by overriding the GameObject class and use Processing to draw text.
